shortDescription.en: A Fullstack ecommerce app developed with Remix and Strapi
shortDescription.es: Aplicación fullstack desarrollada con Remix y Strapi

longDescription.en: Sneakers ecommerce inspired in the Nike Air Force sneaker collection. The Frontend of this project has been made with Remix and the Backend with Strapi, a headless CMS.
longDescription.es: Sneakers ecommerce inspired in the Nike Air Force sneaker collection. The Frontend of this project has been made with Remix and the Backend with Strapi, a headless CMS.
